Title: Sleeveless Beaded Evening Dress with Train

----

Sku: J730

----

Sizes: 8, 16, 10, 18, 4, 6, 12, 14

----

Colors: off-white, black

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: 

----

Description: This gown would look great for any evening occasion. It is floor length with a small train and a sleeveless bodice. There is a illusion scoop neck with a partially sheer back. The bust and waistline is ruched and has a design element of beading that drips into the skirt. This evening gown is beautiful and ready for a night out.
